text:
Clinc | Ann Arbor & SF | Onsite, Full-time | https://clinc.com

Clinc builds the world's most advanced conversational AI platform.

Our team includes top researchers in systems & AI, and engineers that have scaled software at Facebook and Google. We're a post-series A startup that has raised $8M. We are growing quickly (team & revenue!), and we're partnered with some of the world's largest financial institutions.

We have several roles open in our downtown Ann Arbor HQ as well as in our SF office in Fidi:

  * Software Engineer, Machine Learning
  * Software Engineer, Web
  * Software Engineer, Mobile
  * Software Engineer, Infrastructure
  * Product Designer
  * Project Manager
Join us to define the future of conversational experiences.

Learn more and apply at: https://clinc.com/careers.html
